name: Dreadnaught Pauldrons
tooltip:
Dreadnaught PauldronsLevel 60

Korfax at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Dreadnaught Pauldrons if you bring him the following items: 1 Desecrated Pauldrons, 12 Wartorn Plate Scraps, 2 Arcanite Bars and 3 Cured Rugged Hides.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Pauldrons
- Wartorn Plate Scrap x 12
- Arcanite Bar x 2
- Cured Rugged Hide x 3
